name: My Very First Level
description: This game level was made using the 3D Game Kit in Unity. Almost all of the assets contained within are assets from the 3D Game Kit, however the slimes and one door that're contained within were not. The Slime model was provided to me by my teacher Andre Wahl, and the door was something I created from scratch. The slimes I created the animations for, however everything else was provided to me by my instructor.
